metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45953 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Dnsmasq 2.86 has a heap-based buffer overflow inextract_name (called from hash_questions and fuzz_util.c). NOTE: thevendor's position is that CVE-2021-45951 through CVE-2021-45957 "do notrepresent real vulnerabilities, to the best of our knowledge."

criterions.comment: dnsmasq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
